name: Wellspring of War-Lust
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Eula, equip this card.
After Eula equips this card, immediately use Glacial Illumination once.
When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for Lightfall Sword.
(You must have Eula in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1106]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1106] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11063]</color> once.
When your $[A1106], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11062]</color>, this will generate 1 more Zeal for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111062]</color>.
(You must have $[A1106] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Eula</color>, equip this card.
After Eula equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> once.
When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Icetide Vortex</color>, this will generate 1 more Zeal for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lightfall Sword</color>.
(You must have Eula in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Flood of frost will ensure that vengeance is mine.
source: Reward for inviting Eula to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
